description: portrait of a man seated in a high-backed chair, leaning toward PR; man has white hair and thick moustache and wears striped tie; PR hand resting on table in front of man's chest; unfinished--first state?
inscription:
Signature, Edition and Inscription

on back, in pencil: illegible inscription
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1985; sold in December with sixth state for NTO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1985-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC below image, in pencil: [Edgar Chahine epreuve d\'etat]
title: Portrait of Alfred Stevens
